column2: "Hello, <%me>. It looks like there's something you want to ask me."
"You think it's unusual for me to be this talkative in my line of work?"
"You're right, it's unbecoming for someone who acts in the shadows. I'm terrible at keeping secrets."
"Don't worry, that's okay. I've already been branded as a failure..."
"I think you've seen enough to know that it's not unheard of for those types to be snuffed out immediately."
"Plus, I think you've noticed something else."
"I'm not suited for this kind of work at all. I have no aptitude for it."
"I'm the type who likes to be in the spot light, all the while getting information from my surroundings."
"But, there's just no one else now. Hadred destroyed everything. I'm the only one left."
"And that's why I'm here fulfilling a role that I never would have filled otherwise."
"I suppose that's what is known as fate."
